Address.label: Address
Address.value: 100 THROCKMORTON STREET,SUITE 1200, FORT WORTH, Texas, 76102, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Fort Worth-based Range Resources is an independent exploration and production company with that focuses entirely on its operations in the Marcellus Shale in Pennsylvania. At year-end 2021, Range's proved reserves totaled 17.8 trillion cubic feet equivalent, with net production of 2.1 billion cubic feet equivalent per day. Natural gas accounted for 70% of production.
